name: PackMan
description: In Pac chick - old school games packman retro games the player navigates Pac through a maze containing various dots, known as Pac-Dots, and four multi-colored ghosts: Blinky, Pinky, Inky, and Clyde. In pac chick - old school games packman retro games pac game the goal of the old school game is to accumulate points by eating all the Pac-Dots in the maze, completing that 'level' of the old games and starting the next level and maze of Pac-chick.
